text: It would be awesome to be able to generate a random thought. Among all the thoughts I could be having I’d end up thinking one at truly randomly.

elements.text: It would be awesome to be able to generate a random thought. Among all the thoughts I could be having I’d end up thinking one at truly randomly.

text: That got me thinking about the space of all possible "thoughts". The brain seems so resilient but I wonder if there's certain super super weird thoughts that can break the brain in some way
